name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 2, NOS of the Netherlands reported the experience of their reporters in Chengdu, Sichuan, when they were covering the rights protection of Sichuan Trust’s bankruptcy. When the reporters tried to approach the rights defenders, plainclothes police and police rushed over and pushed the reporters down, snatched the microphones and covered their cameras with black umbrellas. They also confiscated their equipment in the car. A few hours later, they were released and returned to the scene, but the rights defenders were gone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In June 2020, Sichuan Trust issued an announcement stating that "due to the global economic downturn, the COVID-19 epidemic and the suspension of TOT trust products, some financing companies failed to return the trust funds on time when they matured, resulting in the failure of some trust products to be distributed on time." It announced a crash.
Four years later, the Sichuan State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission specially established Sichuan Tianfu Chunxiao Enterprise Management Co., Ltd. to "take over" Sichuan Trust and partially redeem the principal of investors.
The redemption ratio is 80% for bids below 1 million yuan; 70% for 1 million to 3 million yuan; 55% for 3 million to 6 million yuan; 50% for 6 million to 10 million yuan, and 40% for bids above 10 million yuan.
NOS reported that some investors said they did not sign the contract completely "voluntarily" because the Chengdu police would go to their homes or workplaces to urge them to sign as soon as possible.
According to Sichuan Tianfu Chunxiao on February 27...
fullContent:
2020年6月，四川信托发布公告称，“受全球经济下行、新冠肺炎疫情及停发TOT信托产品的影响，部分融资企业到期不能按时归还信托资金，导致部分信托产品未能按期分配。”宣布暴雷。
四年后，四川国资委专门成立四川天府春晓企业管理有限公司为四川信托“接盘”，对投资者的本金部分进行部分兑付。
兑付比例为100万元以下的报价比例为80%；100万元至300万元为70%；300万元到600万元为55%；600万元至1000万元为50%，1000万元以上的报价比例为40%。
NOS报道称，一些投资者表示他们并非完全“自愿”签约，因为成都警方会前往他们的住所或工作单位敦促他们尽快签字。
根据2月27日四川天府春晓企业管理有限公司的一则公告称，目前截止2024年2月26日，已与四川天府春晓公司签盯信托受益权转让合同的自然人投资者人数已达到8055人，总体签约率达到95.02%。
春晓公司在给个人投资者的签约手册中写道：“……本方案已经穷尽了能调动的所有化险资源，省市政府、国有企业都作出了巨大贡献，拿出了大量真金白银，尽量降低自然人投资者遭受的损失，方案已是最优方案，并且经过了审批。”

content:
[A female graduate student of Beijing University of Chinese Medicine was accused of anti-party by the Beijing Teaching Staff Committee for participating in a summer camp and committed suicide. Her family lost contact in a strange way to defend their rights] Recently, an article titled "Beijing University of Chinese Medicine female graduate student Liang Yan was persecuted by the Teaching Staff Committee" has attracted widespread public attention. The article stated that at 15:00 on the afternoon of January 24, Liang Yan, a graduate student of Beijing University of Chinese Medicine, was taken to the 203 conference room of the college by the Beijing Teaching Staff Committee for illegal interrogation. The reason was that Liang Yan had participated in a summer camp called "Walk the Right Path and Go a Long Way", and the school accused Liang Yan of participating in a summer camp suspected of being anti-party.
The article mentioned that the Teaching Staff Committee threatened Liang Yan during the interrogation, saying that it had obtained her WeChat chat records and other mobile phone information, and threatened to expel her from the party and asked her to confess other people who participated in the summer camp. At the same time, she was asked to sign the "Party Member Commitment".
Due to being in a state of extreme fear for a long time, on February 5, Liang Yan posted a message on WeChat Moments, "I'm so tired recently and want to rest." Then at around 15:30 that afternoon, she cut her arm and swallowed medicine to commit suicide...
fullContent:
【北中医女研究生因参加夏令营被北京教工委指控反党自杀，家人维权离奇失联】近日，一篇“北中医女研究生梁燕遭教工委迫害“的文章引起舆论广泛关注。文章称，1月24日下午15时，北京中医药大学研究生梁燕被北京教工委带到学院203会议室非法审讯。起因是梁燕曾参加了一个名为“走正道行远路”的夏令营，校方指控梁燕参加的夏令营涉嫌反党。
文中提到教工委在审讯时威胁梁燕称，已获得了她的微信聊天记录等手机信息，并以开除党籍为威胁要求其供出参与夏令营的其他人。同时要求其签署《党员承诺书》。
由于长期处于极度恐惧的状态，2月5日，梁燕在微信朋友圈发文“最近好累，想休息了”随后在当天下午15时30分左右割伤手臂，吞药自杀，后被宿管阿姨发现后送医抢救，在医院洗胃22次，手臂缝合4针。
 但是从事发至今，校方以及教工委没有对此事回应和负责。梁燕母亲王方华曾去警局报案，但警方不予立案。并且学校阻止其母亲进入学校看望女儿。
 2月21日，王方华和梁燕男友陈浩峰先后到拱辰派出所报案，随后失联，同时梁燕失联。
 2月22日晚，陈浩峰父母抵京前去拱辰派出所报案，但警方让其联系学校，并未立案，次日23日上午，陈浩峰父母再次来到拱辰派出所，随后也双双失联。文章发布人为当事人舅舅。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the article was published, it attracted widespread public attention. On February 26, a group of Internet celebrities followed up and forwarded the matter. At noon on the 26th, the topic #北中藥梁燕# rushed to Weibo's hot search, with more than one million views in 24 hours. On the evening of the 26th, Weibo began to intervene and cool down the incident. According to Liang Yan's uncle, the Weibo post about Liang Yan's incident was deleted and banned from being heated by the platform. At the same time, Weibo also removed the topic #北中藥梁燕#, and major platforms began to delete posts about Liang Yan's incident one after another.
As of now, Liang Yan's uncle's Weibo account has been banned by the platform. Liang Yan and her mother Wang Fanghua and others still have no news. On February 29, the Douyin account "Liang Yan and her family members who reported the case disappeared on the tenth day" posted that Liang Yan's uncle was broken into and forcibly taken away by a group of people claiming to be police on February 27. Now Liang Yan's uncle is also out of contact.
On March 2, the official statement of "Walking the Right Way and Going a Long Way Summer Camp" stated that the summer camp...
fullContent:
该文章发布后引发舆论广泛关注，2月26日，一众网络大V跟进并转发此事，26日中午，#北中医梁燕#话题冲上微博热搜，24小时阅读超过百万，26日晚上，微博开始对事件进行干预降温，据梁燕舅舅发文称，关于梁燕事件的微博被平台删帖和禁止加热。同时，微博还下架了#北中医梁燕#话题，各大平台也开始陆续删除关于梁燕的事件贴。
截至目前发文，梁燕舅舅的微博账号已被平台封禁。梁燕及母亲王方华等一行人仍然没有消息，2月29日，抖音账号”梁燕及报案家人失踪第十天“发文称，梁燕的舅舅于2月27日被一群自称是警察的人破门而入，强行带走。现在梁燕的舅舅也处于失联状态。
3月2日，“走正道行远路夏令营”官方发布声明称，夏令营坚持拥护党的方针，从未有过任何违反党纪法律行为。对于梁燕的遭遇深表同情，希望他们一家早日团圆。在此提醒个别参加夏令营的同学，个别别有用心的人喜欢无中生有丑化党和政府的形象，希望同学们提高警惕，避免被人挑唆、利用。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to public information on the Internet, the "Walk the Right Path and Go a Long Way" summer camp is an off-campus educational activity held under the guidance of General Jia Xueyang, former deputy director of the Political Department of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army. It mainly carries out academic lectures, book discussions, simulated military training, art performances, labor practice and other educational activities around the five aspects of "moral education", "intellectual education", "physical education", "aesthetic education" and "labor education".
The "Walk the Right Path and Go a Long Way" summer camp aims to implement the educational policy of the new era and cultivate socialist builders and successors with all-round development of morality, intelligence, physical fitness, aesthetics and labor. As the instructor of the summer camp, General Jia Xueyang, former deputy director of the Political Department of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, pointed out that the core educational goal of the "Walk the Right Path and Go a Long Way" summer camp is to cultivate young people's love for the motherland and the people's outlook on life, adhere to the truth, and exercise excellent style and quality. At the same time, he called on the majority of campers to strengthen their ideals and beliefs, cultivate excellent skills, stick to the right path, pursue the truth, and become a worthy person on the road of national rejuvenation...
fullContent:
根据网上公开资料，“走正道行远路”夏令营是在中国人民解放军原总参谋部政治部副主任贾雪阳将军指导下举办的校外教育活动，主要围绕“德育”“智育”“体育”“美育”“劳育”这五个方面开展学术讲座、读书讨论、模拟军训、文艺汇演、劳动实践等教育活动 。
 走正道行远路夏令营旨在践行新时代教育方针，培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义建设者和接班人 。作为夏令营的指导老师，中国人民解放军原总参谋部政治部副主任贾雪阳将军指出，走正道行远路夏令营的核心教育目标是培养青年人热爱祖国和人民的人生观，坚持真理，锻炼过硬的作风和素质 。同时，他号召广大营员坚定理想信念，练就过硬本领，坚守正道，追求真理，成为民族复兴路上可堪大用、能担重任的栋梁之才
 据悉，走正道行远路夏令营主办方为“北京走正道行远路夏令营文化有限公司”天眼查显示：北京走正道行远路夏令营文化有限公司，成立于2022年，位于北京市，是一家以从事文化艺术业为主的企业。企业注册资本100万人民币。
 据百度百科的资料显示：贾雪阳，男，出生于1949年，河北省平山县河渠村人。曾任中国人民解放军总参谋部政治部副主任，防化指挥工程学院副政委，2003年7月晋升为少将军衔，北京老促会副会长。 
 现担任中国少年军校联盟主席 ，中国秦文研究会会长，英模全国巡回报告团团长以及京津冀平山老区建设促进会长等职务 。
曾获得2010年全国“五一”行业模范称号 ；被家乡群众誉为“希望将军” “中华好将军” ；由河北省教育捐助爱心联合会颁发“教育爱心将军”荣誉称号 ；被平山人民和媒体誉为“烈士英灵的守望者” 。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a resident in Hunan Provincial People's Hospital was overworked and overwhelmed by overwork during the Spring Festival, and finally chose to commit suicide by cutting her carotid artery. Her last words and chat records on Weibo before her death indicated that she originally thought that the main purpose of the resident intern was to learn and combine knowledge with clinical practice, but the reality was that she was a free "cow and horse" for the department. She arrived at the department at 7 o'clock every morning and worked overtime until the early morning, and was also responsible for hygiene. Even if she took a leave because there were too many things, she still had to continue to work overtime. As a result, she was deducted from her salary for taking a leave even though she was working overtime. She lamented that the life of the resident intern was to be manipulated by others. If you want to get a resident intern certificate, you must obey and be treated like a cow and horse.
Finally, she said, "Let's end it early. There is no fairness in the world. I can only blame myself for being an unqualified cow and horse."
The incident resonated with domestic medical students. "Resident interns" is a must for all medical fields. As the girl said, because she must get a "resident intern certificate", she is completely manipulated...
fullContent:
近日，湖南省人民医院有一名规培生因为过年期间一直加班过于劳累不堪重负，最终选择割颈动脉自杀。她生前的微博上的遗言及聊天记录表示，原本以为规培生的主要目的是学习，把知识和临床结合，然而现实却是给科室做免费的“牛马”。每天早上七点到科室加班到凌晨，还要负责卫生。即使是请了假因为事情太多也还是要继续在加班，结果明明在加班却因为请假被扣了工资。感叹规培生活就是被人拿捏，想要拿规培证就必须服从被人当作牛马一样干活。
最后她表示“早点结束吧，世上本就没有公平，只怪自己是不合格的牛马”。
该事件引发了国内医学生的共鸣，“规培生”是所有医学上的必经之路，如该女生所说，因为必须拿到“规培证”因此处于完全被拿捏的状态，工作压力非常巨大，近年来已发生多起自杀及抗议事件。
